doc:
Wallace Shawn https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wallace_Shawn 0 Wallace Michael Shawn (born November 12, 1943) is an American character actor, voice actor, playwright and essayist. His film roles have included those of Wally Shawn (a fictionalized version of himself) in the Louis Malle directed comedy-drama My Dinner with Andre (1981), John Lahr in Prick Up Your Ears (1987), Vizzini in The Princess Bride (1987), Mr. James Hall in Clueless (1995) and providing the voice of Rex in the Toy Story franchise. He has also appeared in a variety of television series, including recurring roles as Grand Nagus Zek in Star Trek: Deep Space Nine (1993–1999) and Cyrus Rose in Gossip Girl (2008–2012). His plays include Obie Award winning Aunt Dan and Lemon (1985), The Designated Mourner (1996) and Grasses of a Thousand Colors (2008). He also co-wrote the screenplay for My Dinner with Andre with Andre Gregory, and he scripted A Master Builder (2013), a film adaptation of the play by Henrik Ibsen, which he also starred in. His book Essays was published in 2009 by Haymarket Books. Wallace_Michael_Shawn ( born November_12_,_1943 ) is an_American_character_actor , voice_actor , playwright_and_essayist . His_film_roles have_included those of Wally_Shawn ( a_fictionalized_version of himself ) in the_Louis_Malle directed comedy-drama_My_Dinner with Andre ( 1981_) , John_Lahr in Prick Up Your_Ears_(_1987_) , Vizzini in The_Princess_Bride_(_1987_) , Mr._James_Hall in Clueless_(_1995 ) and providing the_voice of Rex in the_Toy_Story_franchise . He has_also_appeared in a_variety of television_series , including recurring roles as Grand_Nagus_Zek in Star_Trek : Deep_Space_Nine_(_1993 – 1999_) and Cyrus_Rose in Gossip_Girl_(_2008 – 2012_) . His_plays include Obie_Award winning Aunt_Dan and Lemon_(_1985_) , The_Designated_Mourner_(_1996_)_and_Grasses of a_Thousand_Colors_(_2008_) . He also co-wrote the_screenplay for My_Dinner with Andre with Andre_Gregory , and he scripted A_Master_Builder_(_2013_) , a_film_adaptation of the_play by Henrik_Ibsen , which he also starred in . His_book_Essays was_published in 2009 by Haymarket_Books .
